text: Michael Nelson Trout (born August 7, 1991) is a center fielder for the Los Angeles Angels of Major League Baseball. He has played for the Angels since he joined the major leagues in 2011. He was the Rookie of the Year in 2012, and the Most Valuable Player in the American League in 2014, 2016 and 2019. Trout has been an All-Star six times. ==Other websites== Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim players Category:American League All-Stars Category:People from New Jersey
title: Mike Trout
